attributes.title: HORRIFIC
attributes.review: Unfortunately when I first opened the app I saw the picture of an ugly orange cheeto looking racist, homophobic, sexist, and facist it was traumatizing 😭 Upon seeing this my brain exploded and my poor mom had to grab the mop and clean for hours. It’s an absolutely terrible app would NOT recommend

attributes.title: Horrible App!!!!
attributes.review:
I might have to get a new phone after this because this app is so horrible I feel like it did internal damage to my phone. 
Cheeto man you better buy me a new one with the money you use to pay off p$rn Stars

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review: After this app took forever to download I finally got it and signed up but when I signed up it started glitching and making my phone go crazy like viruses and not letting me go on apps

attributes.title: 👏🏼 TikTok 👏🏼
attributes.review: This app just made me racist and sexist and I’m a brown woman just trying to get through life. I CANT BELIEVE IT. Had to delete after the two seconds of installing it. 😒 But this Orange mf just keep trying to make the US more racist than ever before. Stop supporting this racist, sexist and rapist of a Cheeto Oompa Loompa. 😤#BLACKLIVESMATTER

attributes.title: Terrible, awful app
attributes.review: This app was a disaster to use. It was crashing left and right and the interface was terrible. It also lied about what it promised to do and just was overall terrible. It also killed my dog >:(

attributes.title: a warning
attributes.review: I am saddened to announce that I have passed away due to downloading this dangerous app. The police have launched an investigation into my death and their main suspect is said to be unnaturally orange with tiny hands. If you know anyone matching this description please reach out.

attributes.title: Horrible interface, lots of bugs, barely usable
attributes.review: I really had high hopes for this app, I love knowing what is going on with our great POTUS but this app was so darn difficult to use. I’m disappointed they couldn’t do better for our Donald Trump.

attributes.title: vry vry bad
attributes.review: it took THREE DAYS TO FINALLY INSTALL. and once it finally did i got SO SCARED that i accidentally jumped off my house cause i saw a really orange blob. it was so weird it’s like i went into the 5th dimension and all i could think about was how something could live without any neck.

attributes.title: Literally the worst app possible
attributes.review: This is the worst app to ever come across the App Store. It keeps crashing and breaking down and there’s also this really weird orange monster looking thing??? I hate it, would NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Bugs identified in the app
attributes.review: I taught the app was about to be good but it ended up bugging keep getting over other app and playing on the background even tho I exited out. I wanted to see Trump new plans but that app have to much bugs
